class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: In this fourth clinical course, Family Nurse Practitioner (FNP) students will continue synthesizing and appraising evidence-based guidelines for implementation of health promotion and risk reduction strategies for implementation when caring for patients across the lifespan.
prerequisites: NRSG 806D and NRSG 807D as prerequisites, NRSG 809D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1568, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: H. Venrick, Status: Open
